attributes.action: Reinstate the local elections in nine areas that will be delayed for a year
attributes.additional_details: The elections should be held and any future changes should be debated and local populations given the option to comment on proposals
attributes.background: This should be debated and elections reinstated as per historical arrangements

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
